author: Sean Gregory
title: ‘It Takes My Mind Off This Crazy World.’ A Quarantined World Is Here for Rex Chapman’s Twitter Feed
description: Rex Chapman, a former NBA player who's recovering from drug addiction, is serving up the content a quarantined world needs to see.
